# OG (Frontmatter) Full Automation

## Branch Strategy
- PR to main → Preview deploy (generate OG + build)
- Push to main → Production deploy (generate OG + build)

## GitHub Pages (workflow excerpt)
```yaml
- run: npm ci
- run: npm run og:gen  # frontmatter batch
- run: npm run build
- uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
  with: { path: dist }
- uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
  with: { preview: ${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request' }} }
```

## Cloudflare Pages (workflow excerpt)
```yaml
- run: npm ci
- run: npm run og:gen  # frontmatter batch
- run: npm run build
- uses: cloudflare/pages-action@v1
  with:
    apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
    accountId: $ACCOUNT
    projectName: $PROJECT
    directory: dist
```

## Tips
- Frontmatter: `ogTitle`/`ogPrimary`/`ogSecondary`/`ogFont`
- Output under `public/og/` following docs path structure
- Cache OG images at CDN edge
- Ensure `site` in `astro.config.mjs` matches final URL

See spikes: `starlight-og-frontmatter-themes-batch`, `starlight-og-auto-ci-ghpages`, `starlight-og-auto-ci-cloudflare`.
